Avani Simha (Lion of the Earth)

The actual founder of the Pallava dynasty (Later Pallavas). He ended the Kalabhra dark age and consolidated Pallava rule in Kanchipuram.

ЁЯЧ║я╕П
Expansion

He defeated the Cholas, Pandyas, and Kalabhras, extending his kingdom up to the Kaveri River.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Title: Avani Simha.
  • Culture: The great Sanskrit poet Bharavi (author of Kiratarjuniya) was in his court.
  • Sculpture: The Adivaraha Cave at Mahabalipuram features a carved image of Simhavishnu and his two queens.
